snippet.title: Beyond Shadowgate launch Trailer
snippet.description: Welcome to the world of Beyond Shadowgate - the official sequel to the NES hit game Shadowgate! FIVE times larger than its predecessor, Beyond Shadowgate is the ultimate first-person Point and Click adventure!

localized.title: Beyond Shadowgate launch Trailer
localized.description: Welcome to the world of Beyond Shadowgate - the official sequel to the NES hit game Shadowgate! FIVE times larger than its predecessor, Beyond Shadowgate is the ultimate first-person Point and Click adventure!
